patthana18.2:4.1: Hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.2:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe pañca, vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.2:6.1: Hetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana18.2:7.1: Nahetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.2:8.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cattāri.
